NAME: Shrikanth Balla
ABOUT:
Experienced Program Manager with a demonstrated history of working in the computer software industry. Skilled in Requirement Analysis, Consulting, Project Management, Product Management, IT Service Management, Agile Methodologies, Quality Assurance, Software Testing, and Pre-sales. A dynamic, business-minded executive with rich delivery experience in setting success criteria, planning, managing risks, and leading global teams. Proven track record of delivering complex IT solutions across business domains for clients in EMEA, Central & Eastern Europe, Asia and LATAM in global delivery model. Insightful experience in incubating service offerings, driving growth, and engineering business processes and capabilities.



Areas of Proficiency: 
Program Management
Risk Management Improvement
Onsite Co-ordination & Stakeholder Management
Strategic Planning & Process 
ALM using TFS and VSTS
Change Management 
AX2012, Dynamics 365 
Customer Communications and Relations 
Total Quality Management 
Project Management 
Waterfall, Iterative and Agile Methodologies
